## Problem 2

```{r, echo=TRUE}
par(mfrow=c(1, 1))
radius = c(1:10000)
volume = 4/3*pi*radius^3
plot(radius, volume, main="Line plot of radius vs. volume of a sphere (using type='l')",
     xlab="radius", ylab="volume", 
     ylim=c(0, 1500000), xlim=c(0, 80), 
     type='l', col="green", lwd=2)
```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
dat = data.frame(raduis=radius, volume=volume)
ggplot(dat, aes(x=radius, y=volume)) + geom_line(color="blue") +
  labs(x="radius", y="volume", title="Line plot of radius vs volume of a sphere (ggplot version)") +
  coord_cartesian(ylim=c(0, 1500000), xlim=c(0, 80))
```
